roleset.name: become jaundice, turn yellow

example.name: Whole person rather than one body part (ie eyes)

roleset.note: JAUNDICE-V NOTES: Based on medical data. No VN or FN class. Framed by Katie. (from jaundice.01-v)
JAUNDICED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to jaundice.01-v. (from jaundiced.01-j)
